overview: Sexy club owner Jewel De'Nyle has a problem: her bar business is down and her rent's going up. The solution? Start a dance contest for hot neighborhood girls who want to try stripping for the first time! Watch as new talents Lezley Zen, Aria and Sondra Hall tear up the stage (and the bedroom) in a XXX rollercoaster ride you won't want to miss! Also starring Dayton, Angel Long and Ashley Long.
title: Erotic Intentions
